title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, it is observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
OB: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
EB: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, it is expected that there is no excessive flashing of tabs in the TabFolder and Frames.
SR:
1. Open the control example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
